messages.subject: RE:  Thank You Ren and Dierdre
messages.msgSnippet: for the links to books and websites that you both mentioned.  Ren, I ve been all over the Path to Freedom website and it is absolutely REEKING with great stuff
messages.messageBody:
for the links to books and websites that you both mentioned. Ren, I've
been all over the Path to Freedom website and it is absolutely REEKING
with great stuff :)

Dierdre, I've checked out the square foot gardening website and it
looks like something I can actually do.

I also found an inexpensive little pamphlet in a seed magazine with a
checklist of things that can and cannot go in a compost pile. I'll
check out the redworms too. I've found a couple sites that explain how
they work. They sell them in the same catalog.

Blessings to you.

Sharon
